experiences.description1: Led introductory and advanced Java courses for middle and high school students.
experiences.description2: Fostered critical thinking and problem-solving skills through code debugging and efficiency improvement.
experiences.description3: Communicated as a liaison between students, parents, and management.

experiences.description1: Leverage Python packages such as pandas and numPy, to analyze datasets containing thousands of genes to identify patterns, in efforts to discover biomarkers for Urology diseases, contributing to ongoing research efforts.
experiences.description2: Conduct research to uncover genomic origins of kidney stones, harnessing online databases and sophisticated software tools to filter genomic data, and applying Linux annotation tools such as ANNOVAR in HPC environment.
